channel.title: Would be nice to have a tab to filter chat by election and trial votes
channel.description: It can be tedious at times to have to keep scrolling around to look at how people voted, would be nice I think to have a tab along with Mystic / Prince / General / Whispers tabs just for election and trial votes.

item.title: Would be nice to have a tab to filter chat by election and trial votes
item.dc:creator: Alice
item.description:
+1 Support.

Votes are one of the main forms of scum-reading and the lack of an easy tab for votes kind makes it more of a bother to read people.

For better effect there could be one tab for accusations and another one for trials.

Read full topic
item.source: Would be nice to have a tab to filter chat by election and trial votes

item.title: Would be nice to have a tab to filter chat by election and trial votes
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
Honestly this needs to be a thing

@Ellie a chatlog tab with all votes placed, akin to the one on MafiaUniverse, would be amazing
